about.title: About Expensia
about.subtitle: Your personal expense tracking companion
about.description: Expensia is a personal expense tracking application designed to help you manage your finances effectively. With an intuitive interface, you can track expenses, categorize spending, set up recurring payments, and gain valuable insights into your financial habits.
about.mission: Our mission is to make expense tracking simple and accessible. Whether you're tracking daily purchases, managing monthly bills, or monitoring recurring subscriptions, Expensia helps you stay on top of your finances.
